review_data.title: Quality, priced AYCE lunch offer
review_data.content: Located in Wollishofen, take Tram #7 to Post and Renggergut is about a block away on a side street. I made an online reservation for lunch, which was pretty much confirmed immediately. I decided I would try their AYCE lunch buffet. Priced at 16CHF (24CHF...More

review_data.title: Amazing value at lunchtime
review_data.content: I recently discovered Restaurant Renggergut in my neighbourhood as a spot for lunch - I don't think better value exists in Zurich. The style is buffet, but the atmosphere is refined enough for a casual work lunch. Lunch comes in three courses - the first...More
